text: Ba moli jatim nazdik masaved, magar ʙa nekutarin vache, ki ʙa salohi u ʙosad to ʙa sinni ʙuluƣ rasad. Va pajmonavu vaznro az rui adl komil kuned! Mo ʙa kase cuz ʙa andozai tavonas taklif namekunem. Va har goh suxan gued, odilona gued, harcand ʙa zijoni xesovandon ʙosad. Va ʙa ahdi Xudo vafo kuned! Inhost on ci Xudo sumoro ʙa on suporis mekunad, sojad, ki pand gired
